title: First Love × First Love - Novel Updates
tags: Bookworm   College/University   Dense Protagonist   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple Protagonists   R-18   Short Story
author: Tsukigami Saki   月神サキ
description:
Shion and Sakura. The two of them met at the university library.
Senpai who likes reading books more than anything, and kouhai who loves watching such senpai.
It’s the details of the first love of the two people whose feelings passed by each other.

※ It’s hard to call the ending happy. Those not good with that, please refrain from reading.>
